dmca.title: Fraud site - www.ground-escrow.com
dmca.body:
----Original Message-----
From: Brandon Abbey [mailto:babbey@escrow.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 11, 2005 2:26 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Cc: IFCC33@ifccfbi.gov; tchu@fbi.gov; la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov
Subject: Fraud site - www.ground-escrow.com

 

You are hosting a fraud site at www.ground-escrow.com
<http://www.ground-escrow.com/>  

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention that your company
provides services to a website, www.ground-escrow.com
<http://www.ground-escrow.com/>  , which is infringing on Escrow.com's
intellectual property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com
(www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  They have copied material
directly from our site and claim an affiliation with IES.

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.ground-escrow.com <http://www.ground-escrow.com/>   site,
http://www.ground-escrow.com/company.php  Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any
affiliation with www.ground-escrow.com <http://www.ground-escrow.com/>  ,
and has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the
law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.  

 

 

 

 



 

Brandon W. Abbey

Managing Director

Escrow.com

16275 Laguna Canyon Road

Irvine, CA  92618

Direct - 949-790-5880

Fax - 949-790-5811
